properties.name: --select-padding
properties.description: Padding applied to select items and trigger. Default: 4px 4px

properties.name: --select-gap
properties.description: Gap between the trigger and content (dropdown). Default: 4px

properties.name: --select-focus-bg
properties.description: Background color for focused/hovered items. Default: hsl(var(--color-foreground, 0 0% 0%) / var(--color-opacity-2, 0.2))

properties.name: --select-focus-outline
properties.description: Outline for focused/hovered items. Default: var(--border-width, 1px) solid hsl(var(--color-foreground, 0 0% 0%) / var(--color-opacity-3, 0.3))

properties.name: --select-selected-bg
properties.description: Background color for selected items. Default: hsl(var(--color-foreground, 0 0% 0%) / var(--color-opacity-3, 0.3))

properties.name: --select-selected-outline
properties.description: Outline for selected items. Default: var(--border-width, 1px) solid hsl(var(--color-foreground, 0 0% 0%) / var(--color-opacity-4, 0.4))

pseudoClasses.name: :hover
pseudoClasses.description: Styles applied when hovering over select items or trigger

pseudoClasses.name: :focus
pseudoClasses.description: Styles applied when select items or trigger have keyboard focus

pseudoClasses.name: :disabled
pseudoClasses.description: Styles applied to disabled select items
